courses.title: Bharatanatyam Basics
courses.description: Learn the foundational movements and expressions of Bharatanatyam, a classical dance of Tamil Nadu.

courses.title: Kathak Rhythm & Grace
courses.description: Dive into Kathak with spins, footwork, and storytelling through graceful movements.

courses.title: Garba & Dandiya Raas
courses.description: Celebrate the spirit of Gujarat with energetic Garba and rhythmic Dandiya moves.

courses.title: Odissi Dance Foundations
courses.description: Learn the elegant poses and flowing movements of Odissi, the classical dance of Odisha.

courses.title: Bhangra for Beginners
courses.description: Get energized with basic Bhangra steps, a fun and vibrant dance from Punjab.

courses.title: Mohiniyattam Grace
courses.description: Explore the gentle, swaying style of Mohiniyattam, a classical dance from Kerala.

courses.title: Sattriya Dance Journey
courses.description: Begin your journey into Sattriya, a sacred classical dance from Assam.

courses.title: Contemporary Dance Fusion
courses.description: Blend classical, jazz, and modern dance styles in this expressive fusion course.

courses.title: Ghoomar Traditional Steps

courses.title: Hip-Hop Indian Style
courses.description: Master hip-hop dance techniques with an Indian twist for urban performances.
